def_cn: 沉思的;默想的;认真思考的
def_en: If you are thoughtful, you are quiet and serious because you are thinking about something.

def_cn: 体贴入微的;考虑周到的
def_en: If you describe someone as thoughtful, you approve of them because they remember what other people want, need, or feel, and try not to upset them.

def_cn: (书籍、电影、讲话等)严肃的，思想性强的
def_en: If you describe something such as a book, film, or speech as thoughtful, you mean that it is serious and well thought out.
